name: Corn, Tomato And Black Bean Salad
keywords: black beans, cherry tomatoes, corn on the cob, side dish, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cooked black beans (or 1 16-ounce can, drained)
1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, basil-flavored if available
Coarse sea salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Shuck the corn and scrape off the kernels with a knife. Combine with the black beans in a bowl.
Cut the tomatoes into quarters, and add them to the beans with the onion. Add the oil, lime juice, salt and pepper, and mix well.
Just before serving, snip the basil leaves with scissors and mix them into the salad. Correct seasoning.
